comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content:
El General Braulio Hernánez colaboró en la Revolución maderista de 1910-1911.  En 1912 se unió a la Revelión de los "Colorados" de Pascual Orozco contra el Presidente Madero en el Estado de Chihuahua.
Dr. Roberto Duarte

comment.author: 14350023@N07
comment._content: He was a prominant supporter of Madero who later became a more radical Orozquista.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: jerodamor@yahoo.com.mx and Shadrach Chistopoulos: Thanks for the information on General Braulio Hernánez . We will add some of the details to the image description when we update.

comment.author: 74482999@N03
comment._content: Braulio Hernandez was a Baptist minister prior to the revolution.  It is said he pursued his work in the revolution with the zeal of an evangelist.  Protestants made up a disproportionate share of the revolutionary armies.
